title: THE DARK CRYSTAL (1982) Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment:
"The entire plot of the Dark Crystal"
-fixed the title for you.

It wasn't meant to be a kid's movie
Henson said himself he wanted a long narrative full feature puppet movie with a serious plot, not kids....
Hard watching the Netflix series when you know eventually all the gelflings are going to die
I found the Netflix series amazing and wondrous.
This wasn't meant to be a kid movie. The new show is quite good as well.
description:
Just before the release of Netflix's new "The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance" I explain the ending and some of the lore surrounding Jim Henson's 1982 film, "The Dark Crystal."
